subject: Software download shows unverified by windows
description_text:
Hello I was just wondering if I needed to install the pedal software a specific way. When i installed the pedal software it shows as unverified. Do I need a different download or you need to install it do the computer using a specific method 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Royally Reigned,  You can install it directly and start using it.Â
